newsitem.title: USA: U.S. BARGE RATES - RATES STEADY AND LIGHTLY QUOTED.
newsitem.headline: U.S. BARGE RATES - RATES STEADY AND LIGHTLY QUOTED.

text.p: U.S. barge rates remained steady amid thin activity on Wednesday on the St. Louis Merchants Exchange call session.
No barges traded versus none on Tuesday.
- Two barges, St Paul-Savage, upper Mississippi River, this week, bid 155 percent of tariff, unchanged from Tuesday, similar, no offer.
- Two barges, Illinois River, next week, bid 105 percent, unchanged from Tuesday, no offer.
